description:
Parameters for getting all setup configuration.

Used by `setup_get_all` to retrieve the entire device configuration.

# Fields * `flatten` - If true, returns flattened structure with dot-notation paths as keys

# Example - Hierarchical structure ```json { "flatten": false } ```

# Example - Flattened structure ```json { "flatten": true } ``` Returns: `{"audio.output.speaker.1": { "gain": -3.0, ...}}`

flatten.description: If true, flatten nested structure into dot-notation paths

title: JapiGetAllParams
